description: This file contains validation functions for user input, including password and email validation, as well as a utility function to select validation based on type.

methods.name: registerPasswordValidator
methods.description: Validates password strength based on length, lowercase, uppercase, number, and special character requirements.

methods.name: registerEmailValidator
methods.description: Validates email format for registration using a regex pattern.

methods.name: loginEmailValidator
methods.description: Validates email format for login, similar to registration validation.

methods.name: loginPasswordValidator
methods.description: Checks if login password is non-empty.

methods.name: validator
methods.description: Selects and applies the appropriate validation function based on validationType parameter.
